scripts.format:css: find purepale -type f -name '*.css' | xargs -I {} bash -c 'npx css-beautify -q --end-with-newline {} | diff -q - {} '
scripts.format:html: find purepale -name '*.html'| xargs -I {} bash -c 'npx html-beautify -q --end-with-newline {} | diff -q - {} '
scripts.test: run-s test:eslint test:html test:md test:css format:html format:css
scripts.test:css: find purepale -type f -name '*.css' | xargs npx stylelint
